page_content:
5
OUR APPROACH
TPG’s commitment to continuing to advance ESG performance within the firm and externally in  
our communities and ecosystem is both part of our culture every day and underpinned by a strong, 
explicit foundation. This includes our firm-wide ESG policy  - an approach grounded in rigor and a 
focus on ESG materiality, with ongoing investment in dedicated ESG capabilities and resources.
